Sentencas: Air plasma-sprayed (APS) coatings provide an ability to deposit a range of novel fuel cell materials at competitive costs.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC

Sentencas: This work develops three separate types of composite anodes (Mo-Mo2C/Al2O3, Mo-Mo2C/ZrO2, Mo-Mo2C/TiO2) using a combination of APS process parameters on Hastelloy(A (R))X for application in intermediate temperature proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC

Sentencas: Commercially available carbide of molybdenum powder catalyst (Mo-Mo2C) and three metal oxides (Al2O3, ZrO2, TiO2) was used to prepare three separate composite feedstock powders to fabricate three different anodes.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC

Sentencas: Each of the modified composition anode feedstock powders included a stoichiometric weight ratio of 0.8:0.2.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC

Sentencas: The coatings were characterized by scanning electron microscopy, energy dispersive spectroscopy, x-ray diffraction, nanoindentation, and conductivity.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC

Sentencas: We report herein that three optimized anode layers of thicknesses between 200 and 300 A mu m and porosity as high as 20% for Mo-Mo2C/Al2O3 (250-A mu m thick) and Mo-Mo2C/TiO2 (300 A mu m thick) and 17% for Mo-Mo2C/ZrO2 (220-A mu m thick), controllable by a selection of the APS process parameters with no addition of sacrificial pore-forming material.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC

Sentencas: The nanohardness results indicate the upper layers of the coatings have higher values than the subsurface layers in coatings with some effect of the deposition on the substrate.
Titulo: Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC
Development of Plasma-Sprayed Molybdenum Carbide-Based Anode Layers with Various Metal Oxides for SOFC
